name: Sludge (Lachlan Quirke)
description:
Hi, uhhh. Not sure what to say here. This is the first time I am uploading a game I've made. It's original but its a simple concept so i assume there are many other games of similar substance. This is primarily for my school mates so it is constantly being updated . lastly I consider this the dark souls of platformers. Ok have fun and don't break anything. 

Disclaimer, i am not at fault for anything you break in a rage. furthermore i am not responsible for you playing it in a class.
